analysis.description:
PlayCryptoGaming.cryptoGamersAreInitiated (/unique_chucks/21/0xcf150b933af065083ae80addac56f9a7b3324436.sol#26-28) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- InitiateCryptoGamers (/unique_chucks/21/0xcf150b933af065083ae80addac56f9a7b3324436.sol#237-263)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0xcf150b933af065083ae80addac56f9a7b3324436.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/21/0xcf150b933af065083ae80addac56f9a7b3324436.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_cryptoGamerId' of PlayCryptoGaming.purchaseCryptoGamer (/unique_chucks/21/0xcf150b933af065083ae80addac56f9a7b3324436.sol#47) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newPrice' of PlayCryptoGaming.updatePriceContract (/unique_chucks/21/0xcf150b933af065083ae80addac56f9a7b3324436.sol#136) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_cryptoGamerId' of PlayCryptoGaming.updateCryptoGamerPrice (/unique_chucks/21/0xcf150b933af065083ae80addac56f9a7b3324436.sol#147-148) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newPrice' of PlayCryptoGaming.updateCryptoGamerPrice (/unique_chucks/21/0xcf150b933af065083ae80addac56f9a7b3324436.sol#148) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_cryptoGamerId' of PlayCryptoGaming.getCryptoGamer (/unique_chucks/21/0xcf150b933af065083ae80addac56f9a7b3324436.sol#158) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_cryptoGamerName' of PlayCryptoGaming.createCryptoGamer (/unique_chucks/21/0xcf150b933af065083ae80addac56f9a7b3324436.sol#232-233) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_cryptoGamerPrice' of PlayCryptoGaming.createCryptoGamer (/unique_chucks/21/0xcf150b933af065083ae80addac56f9a7b3324436.sol#233) is not in mixedCase
